Package com.google.mu.safesql

Class GoogleSql

java.lang.Object
com.google.mu.safesql.GoogleSql
@RequiresGuava public final class GoogleSql extends Object
Facade class providing SafeQuery templates for GoogleSQL.
Since:
7.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static SafeQuery
    from(String queryTemplate, Object... args)

  • Method Details

    • from

      @TemplateFormatMethod public static SafeQuery from(@CompileTimeConstant @TemplateString String queryTemplate, Object... args)
      Much like SafeQuery.of(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...), but with additional GoogleSQL translation rules.

      Specifically, Instant are translated to `TIMESTAMP()` GoogleSql function, ZonedDateTime are translated to `DATETIME()` GoogleSql function, and LocalDate are translated to `DATE()` GoogleSql function.

      Since:
      8.0

    • template

      public static StringFormat.Template<SafeQuery> template(@CompileTimeConstant String formatString)
      Much like SafeQuery.template(java.lang.String), but with additional GoogleSQL translation rules.

      Specifically, Instant are translated to `TIMESTAMP()` GoogleSql function, ZonedDateTime are translated to `DATETIME()` GoogleSql function, and LocalDate are translated to `DATE()` GoogleSql function.
